abstract: A United Nations working group is trying to to come up with, and constantly improve, guidelines for handling insolvency cases. Both cross-boarder cooperation and international harmonization are the aim.
snippet: A United Nations working group is trying to to come up with, and constantly improve, guidelines for handling insolvency cases. Both cross-boarder cooperation and international harmonization are the aim.
lead_paragraph: 12:37 p.m. | Updated The UNCITRAL Insolvency Working Group is meeting all week. (I’m participating as an observer, although of course this column represents only my own views.)
